main event: A strange unidentified flying object was spotted over Ellenville, New York on April 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object was first spotted over the mountain and appeared to be as long as a quarter of the mountain.
The object was witnessed by many people, first noticed from the third floor of the American Legion.
Some people claimed they could see into the object and there was an occupant inside.
The object suddenly faded away over the horizon in about 20 minutes.
The Air Force requested more information from the witness to further evaluate the sighting.
